data.name: TestScrollVersion
data.value: {"version":"Test Scroll Version","date":"2024-07-20","modifications":[{"text":"TEST: This entry is for testing the scroll function","type":0},{"text":"TEST: Another test entry to verify the scroll function","type":0},{"text":"TEST: Long text to test the text wrapping function in the scroll view. This text should be long enough to demonstrate and test the text wrapping function.","type":0},{"text":"TEST: Another long text entry to test the scroll function and the general user interface of the changelog dialog.","type":0},{"text":"TEST: Fifth test entry","type":0},{"text":"TEST: Sixth test entry","type":0},{"text":"TEST: Seventh test entry","type":0},{"text":"TEST: Eighth test entry","type":0},{"text":"TEST: Ninth test entry","type":0},{"text":"TEST: Tenth test entry","type":0}]}

data.name: Version_1_0_0
data.value: {"version":"Version 1.0.0","date":"2023-09-15","modifications":[{"text":"Initial release of eTools Ultimate","type":0},{"text":"Basic functionality for editing items","type":0},{"text":"Support for loading and saving Spec_Item.txt files","type":0},{"text":"Dark mode UI implemented","type":0}]}

data.name: Version_1_2_0
data.value: {"version":"Version 1.2.0","date":"2023-11-15","modifications":[{"text":"Added support for analyzing defineItem.h to extract item IDs","type":0},{"text":"Added support for analyzing mdlDyna.inc to obtain model filenames","type":0},{"text":"Reorganization of the General area with new field order","type":1},{"text":"Moved icon display from Visual Properties to the General area","type":1},{"text":"Improved image loading with support for DDS files","type":4},{"text":"Changed tradeable control to a modern toggle switch","type":1},{"text":"Updated changelog with a grouped accordion view","type":5},{"text":"Added dedicated changelog page","type":0},{"text":"Added dedicated changelog page","type":5},{"text":"Added maximum stack size limit (9999) with help text","type":0}]}

data.name: Version_1_2_3
data.value: {"version":"Version 1.2.3","date":"2024-06-20","modifications":[{"text":"Extended DDS texture preview with zoom controls","type":0},{"text":"Added detailed tooltips explaining DDS format options","type":0},{"text":"Improved transparency handling for DDS textures with pink backgrounds","type":4},{"text":"Implemented intelligent format detection for better DDS rendering","type":0},{"text":"Added pixel-perfect rendering for clearer icon display","type":4},{"text":"Consistent dark mode formatting across all dialog components","type":1},{"text":"Removed item rarity field from the editor interface","type":2},{"text":"Optimized changelog display with improved layout","type":4},{"text":"Fixed various UI formatting inconsistencies","type":3}]}

data.name: Version_1_2_4
data.value: {"version":"Version 1.2.4","date":"2024-06-25","modifications":[{"text":"Completely redesigned DDS texture preview with extended zoom options (1x-10x)","type":4},{"text":"Optimized display of DDS textures with pixel-perfect scaling","type":4},{"text":"Dynamic size adjustment of the preview window based on zoom level and image content","type":0},{"text":"Improved dialog user interface with clearer arrangement and better accessibility","type":4},{"text":"Removed duplicate close buttons in the preview window","type":3},{"text":"Optimized dialog size for different zoom levels","type":1},{"text":"More precise image rendering function for DDS textures","type":4},{"text":"Improved dialog interaction prevents accidental closure","type":3},{"text":"Consistent dark mode styling across all preview window components","type":4}]}

data.name: Version_1_2_5
data.value: {"version":"Version 1.2.5","date":"2024-07-02","modifications":[{"text":"Converted table layout to a compact grid layout in the 'Collect' tab","type":1},{"text":"Implemented SortableGridItem component for drag-and-drop functionality in grid format","type":0},{"text":"Optimized item display with two-column layout for better space efficiency","type":4},{"text":"Redesigned probability fields to display inline with element names","type":1},{"text":"Fixed data loading issues by passing availableItems directly through the component hierarchy","type":3},{"text":"Improved layout of collection items for better visualization and reduced scrolling","type":4},{"text":"Removed faulty references to NPCTab that caused linter errors","type":3},{"text":"Optimized formatting with uniform width constraints for probability inputs","type":4}]}
